chat_history.game: Zordon: Green Ranger, we have an urgent situation. Rita Repulsa has dispatched a squadron of Putty Patrollers to the Angel Grove Park!

chat_history.user: Understood, Zordon. I'm on my way. Time to make some clay pigeons!

chat_history.game: Alpha 5: Ay-yi-yi! Be careful, Tommy! My sensors indicate unusually high energy readings from that area.

chat_history.user: Don't worry, Alpha. If they're looking for a fight, they'll get one. Dragon Dagger, play your song!

chat_history.game: (The Dragon Dagger's melody echoes. The ground trembles slightly.)

chat_history.user: Alright, Putties! Let's see what you've got!

chat_history.game: A dozen Putty Patrollers materialize, their grey forms gurgling menacingly. One lunges at you!

chat_history.user: Too slow! Hyah! (You sidestep and deliver a swift kick.)

chat_history.game: Suddenly, a larger, more menacing figure teleports in behind the Putties. It's Goldar!
Goldar: Well, well, Green Ranger. Fancy meeting you here. Prepare to face your doom!

chat_history.user: Goldar! This just got interesting. Bring it on, monkey-face!
